name: Monkey King
title: Sun Wukong
lore: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, is a trickster born from a stone. He wields an enchanted staff that can change size.

boundlessStrike.name: Boundless Strike
boundlessStrike.description: Monkey King slams his staff, stunning and dealing critical damage in a line.

treesDance.name: Tree Dance
treesDance.description: Jumps to a tree, gaining unobstructed vision. Attacks from trees deal bonus damage.

jinguMastery.name: Jingu Mastery
jinguMastery.description: Attacks on the same target grant bonus damage and lifesteal on the next four attacks.

wukongsCommand.name: Wukong's Command
wukongsCommand.description: Creates a circular formation of soldiers that attack enemies within the ring.
